descriptionHtml:
[b]===Lore===[/b]

[font=arial][i]Through the ages many weapon plans have been lost to the ravages of time. Some of the realms most mighty designs disappeared into the ether, where mans eyes would never gaze upon them again. Until now. The Dragonborn once again walks the land, exploring the ancient crypts and cairns, dwarven ruins and vast underground caverns that once held the knowledge of the ancients. As you wander your eye behold wonders once lost to man, knowledge of ancient crafting fills your mind and visions of amazing ancient weapons fill your mind. As your abilities in the smithing arts increases you come to realize that you to and craft these once mighty weapons, with the proper materials & a hot enough forge these tools of ancient destruction can once again ravage the battlegrounds of a world now torn asunder by the rise of the dragon scourge. Go forth Dragonborn, and forge weapons to honor the ghosts of the long forgotten.[/i][/font]

[b]===Idea===[/b]

This mod started off as a single weapon, the Rueful Axe, made craftable and unenchanted, but then it became more. Now it is 3 weapons, spread out over the Orish, Ebony and Daedric Smithing trees. They are vanilla weapons, no new meshes or anything, but they add 3 new, serious, yet lore friendly weapons to the game. Right now available are, the Ancient Nord Battleaxe, the Ancient Nordic Blade & finally the Ancient Nordic Warhammer. These weapons are pumped up versions of the originals, making them ideal for people who like the look of the Daedric artifacts but can be obtained via smithing. I plan in further releases to bring the shields and other weapons into the smithing tree, and I know this isnt original and others have done it, but I\'ve tweaked the weapons nicely, to make them lore friendly, as well as balanced and also, slightly more awkward to create.

[b][i]Ancient Battle Axe[/i][/b]
===Stats===
[i]Weight 20
Damage 22
Reach 1.3
Speed .9250
Crit Damage 12[/i]

[b][i]Ancient Nordic Blade[/i][/b]
===Stats===
[i]Weight 20
Damage 24
Reach 1.2
Speed 1.0000
Crit Damage 12[/i]

[b][i]Ancient Nordic Warhammer[/i][/b]
===Stats===
[i]Weight 28
Damage 30
Reach 1.3
Speed .7500
Crit Damage 15[/i]

They all have modified stagger levels to, swords have less then axes and axes have less then the warhammer.

[b]===Crafting===[/b]

[b][i]Ancient Battle Axe[/i][/b]
[u]--Requires Orcish Smithing--[/u]
8 Orichalcum Ingots
2 Iron Ingots
2 Leather Strips
2 Hagraven Feathers (for the handle)

[u]--Temper--[/u]
2 Orichalcum Ingots

[b][i]Ancient Nordic Blade[/i][/b]
[u]--Requires Ebony Smithing---[/u]
3 Leather Strips
3 Silver Ingots
5 Ebony Ingots

[u]--Temper--[/u]
1 Ebony Ingot
1 Silver Ingot
2 Leather Strips

[b][i]Ancient Nordic Warhammer[/i][/b]
[u]--Requires Daedric Smithing---[/u]
2 Chaurus Chitin (for the handle/grip)
2 Iron Ingots
3 Leather Strips
5 Ebony Ingots

[u]--Temper--[/u]
2 Ebony Ingots
2 Iron Ingots


===Further Notes===
--Updating---
If your updating there should be no need to reforge any of your items, names have changed, but the .esp hasnt so the weapons should stay the same.

--Other stuff--
I suggest you use the following mod along side it to get the most out of the item
Rueful Axe by k-xperience
It retextures the axe and makes it look superb. I use the 2048x2048 version
